name: USplineComponent
doc:
A spline component is a spline shape which can be used for other purposes (e.g. animating objects). It contains debug rendering capabilities.
@see https://docs.unrealengine.com/latest/INT/Resources/ContentExamples/Blueprint_Splines

ReparamStepsPerSegment: Number of steps per spline segment to place in the reparameterization table
Duration: Specifies the duration of the spline in seconds
bStationaryEndpoints: Whether the endpoints of the spline are considered stationary when traversing the spline at non-constant velocity.  Essentially this sets the endpoints' tangents to zero vectors.
bSplineHasBeenEdited: Whether the spline has been edited from its default by the spline component visualizer
bInputSplinePointsToConstructionScript:
Whether the spline points should be passed to the User Construction Script so they can be further manipulated by it.
If false, they will not be visible to it, and it will not be able to influence the per-instance positions set in the editor.
bDrawDebug: If true, the spline will be rendered if the Splines showflag is set.
bClosedLoop:
Whether the spline is to be considered as a closed loop.
Use SetClosedLoop() to set this property, and IsClosedLoop() to read it.
EditorUnselectedSplineSegmentColor: Color of unselected spline component parts in the editor
EditorSelectedSplineSegmentColor: Color of selected spline component parts in the editor
EditorTangentColor: Color of spline point tangents in the editor
bAllowDiscontinuousSpline: Whether the spline's leave and arrive tangents can be different
bShouldVisualizeScale: Whether scale visualization should be displayed
ScaleVisualizationWidth: Width of spline in editor for use with scale visualization

methods.name: AddPoint
methods.doc: Adds an FSplinePoint to the spline. This contains its input key, position, tangent, rotation and scale.

methods.name: AddPoints
methods.doc: Adds an array of FSplinePoints to the spline.

methods.name: AddSplinePoint
methods.doc: Adds a point to the spline

methods.name: AddSplinePointAtIndex
methods.doc: Adds a point to the spline at the specified index

methods.name: ClearSplinePoints
methods.doc: Clears all the points in the spline

methods.name: ConvertSplineSegmentToPolyLine
methods.doc: Given a threshold, returns a list of vertices along the spline segment that, treated as a list of segments (polyline), matches the spline shape.

methods.name: ConvertSplineToPolyLine
methods.doc: Given a threshold, returns a list of vertices along the spline that, treated as a list of segments (polyline), matches the spline shape.

methods.name: ConvertSplineToPolyline_InDistanceRange
methods.doc: Given a threshold and a start and end distance range, returns a list of vertices along the spline that, treated as a list of segments (polyline), matches the spline shape in that range. Also fills a list of corresponding distances along the spline for each point.

methods.name: ConvertSplineToPolyline_InTimeRange
methods.doc: Given a threshold and start and end time range, returns a list of vertices along the spline that, treated as a list of segments (polyline), matches the spline shape in that range. Also fills a list of corresponding distances along the spline for each point.

methods.name: ConvertSplineToPolyLineWithDistances
methods.doc: Given a threshold, returns a list of vertices along the spline that, treated as a list of segments (polyline), matches the spline shape. Also fills a list of corresponding distances along the spline for each point.

methods.name: DivideSplineIntoPolylineRecursive
methods.doc: Given a threshold, recursively sub-divides the spline section until the list of segments (polyline) matches the spline shape. Note: Prefer ConvertSplineToPolyline_InDistanceRange

methods.name: DivideSplineIntoPolylineRecursiveWithDistances
methods.doc: Given a threshold, recursively sub-divides the spline section until the list of segments (polyline) matches the spline shape. Note: Prefer ConvertSplineToPolyline_InDistanceRange

methods.name: FindDirectionClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return a unit direction vector of the spline tangent closest to the location.

methods.name: FindInputKeyClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return the input key closest to that location.

methods.name: FindLocationClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return the point on the curve that is closest to the location.

methods.name: FindRightVectorClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return a unit direction vector corresponding to the spline's right vector closest to the location.

methods.name: FindRollClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return the spline's roll closest to the location, in degrees.

methods.name: FindRotationClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return rotation corresponding to the spline's rotation closest to the location.

methods.name: FindScaleClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return the spline's scale closest to the location.

methods.name: FindTangentClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return the tangent vector of the spline closest to the location.

methods.name: FindTransformClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return an FTransform closest to that location.

methods.name: FindUpVectorClosestToWorldLocation
methods.doc: Given a location, in world space, return a unit direction vector corresponding to the spline's up vector closest to the location.

methods.name: GetArriveTangentAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the arrive tangent at spline point

methods.name: GetDefaultUpVector
methods.doc: Gets the default up vector used by this spline

methods.name: GetDirectionAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return a unit direction vector of the spline tangent there.

methods.name: GetDirectionAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get unit direction along spline at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetDirectionAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the direction at spline point

methods.name: GetDirectionAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return a unit direction vector of the spline tangent there.

methods.name: GetDistanceAlongSplineAtLocation
methods.doc: Get distance along the spline at closest point of the provided input location

methods.name: GetDistanceAlongSplineAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get distance along the spline at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetDistanceAlongSplineAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the distance along the spline at the spline point

methods.name: GetFloatPropertyAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get a metadata property float value along the spline at spline input key

methods.name: GetFloatPropertyAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get a metadata property float value along the spline at spline point

methods.name: GetInputKeyValueAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc:
Given a distance along the length of this spline, return the corresponding input key at that point
with a fractional component between the current input key and the next as a percentage.

methods.name: GetInputKeyValueAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the input key (e.g. the time) of the control point of the spline at the specified index.

methods.name: GetLeaveTangentAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the leave tangent at spline point

methods.name: GetLocationAndTangentAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get location and tangent at a spline point

methods.name: GetLocationAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return the point in space where this puts you

methods.name: GetLocationAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get location along spline at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetLocationAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the location at spline point

methods.name: GetLocationAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the point in space where this puts you

methods.name: GetNumberOfSplinePoints
methods.doc: Get the number of points that make up this spline

methods.name: GetNumberOfSplineSegments
methods.doc: Get the number of segments that make up this spline

methods.name: GetRightVectorAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return a unit direction vector corresponding to the spline's right vector there.

methods.name: GetRightVectorAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get right vector at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetRightVectorAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the right vector at spline point

methods.name: GetRightVectorAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the spline's right vector there.

methods.name: GetRollAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return the spline's roll there, in degrees.

methods.name: GetRollAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get roll in degrees at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetRollAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the amount of roll at spline point, in degrees

methods.name: GetRollAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the spline's roll there, in degrees.

methods.name: GetRotationAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return a rotation corresponding to the spline's rotation there.

methods.name: GetRotationAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get rotator corresponding to rotation along spline at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetRotationAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the rotation at spline point as a rotator

methods.name: GetRotationAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return a rotation corresponding to the spline's position and direction there.

methods.name: GetScaleAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return the spline's scale there.

methods.name: GetScaleAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get scale at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetScaleAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the scale at spline point

methods.name: GetScaleAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the spline's scale there.

methods.name: GetSplineLength
methods.doc: Returns total length along this spline

methods.name: GetSplinePointAt
methods.doc: Gets the spline point of the spline at the specified index

methods.name: GetSplinePointType
methods.doc: Get the type of a spline point

methods.name: GetTangentAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return the tangent vector of the spline there.

methods.name: GetTangentAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get tangent along spline at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetTangentAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the tangent at spline point. This fetches the Leave tangent of the point.

methods.name: GetTangentAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the spline's tangent there.

methods.name: GetTimeAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return the corresponding time at that point

methods.name: GetTransformAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return an FTransform corresponding to that point on the spline.

methods.name: GetTransformAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get transform at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetTransformAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the transform at spline point

methods.name: GetTransformAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the spline's transform at the corresponding position.

methods.name: GetUpVectorAtDistanceAlongSpline
methods.doc: Given a distance along the length of this spline, return a unit direction vector corresponding to the spline's up vector there.

methods.name: GetUpVectorAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get up vector at the provided input key value

methods.name: GetUpVectorAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get the up vector at spline point

methods.name: GetUpVectorAtTime
methods.doc: Given a time from 0 to the spline duration, return the spline's up vector there.

methods.name: GetVectorPropertyAtSplineInputKey
methods.doc: Get a metadata property vector value along the spline at spline input key

methods.name: GetVectorPropertyAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Get a metadata property vector value along the spline at spline point

methods.name: IsClosedLoop
methods.doc: Check whether the spline is a closed loop or not

methods.name: RemoveSplinePoint
methods.doc: Removes point at specified index from the spline

methods.name: SetClosedLoop
methods.doc: Specify whether the spline is a closed loop or not. The loop position will be at 1.0 after the last point's input key

methods.name: SetClosedLoopAtPosition
methods.doc: Specify whether the spline is a closed loop or not, and if so, the input key corresponding to the loop point

methods.name: SetDefaultUpVector
methods.doc: Sets the default up vector used by this spline

methods.name: SetDrawDebug
methods.doc: Specify whether this spline should be rendered when the Editor/Game spline show flag is set

methods.name: SetLocationAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Move an existing point to a new location

methods.name: SetRotationAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Set the rotation of an existing spline point

methods.name: SetScaleAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Set the scale at a given spline point

methods.name: SetSelectedSplineSegmentColor
methods.doc: Specify selected spline component segment color in the editor

methods.name: SetSplinePoints
methods.doc: Sets the spline to an array of points

methods.name: SetSplinePointType
methods.doc: Specify the type of a spline point

methods.name: SetTangentAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Specify the tangent at a given spline point

methods.name: SetTangentColor
methods.doc: Specify selected spline component segment color in the editor

methods.name: SetTangentsAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Specify the tangents at a given spline point

methods.name: SetUnselectedSplineSegmentColor
methods.doc: Specify unselected spline component segment color in the editor

methods.name: SetUpVectorAtSplinePoint
methods.doc: Specify the up vector at a given spline point

methods.name: UpdateSpline
methods.doc: Update the spline tangents and SplineReparamTable
